summary:
This mod changes Golldir to younger looks.
- Textures and meshes are independent (but body is not, face only)
- Selectable hairstyle (Apachii / Vanilla)
descriptionHtml:
Sorry, I'm poor at English. Therefore, I may not be able to support well.

[color=#ea9999]18/12/2016 The distribution of CME data has ended. Â Thank you for everything.[/color]

[Summary]
This mod changes Golldir to younger looks.
- Textures and meshes are independent (but body is not, face only)
- Selectable hairstyle (Apachii / Vanilla)

[b]About Option file[/b]:
Will be able to marriage with him by installing it.
In addition, changing his level cap to 99.

[Permission]
[color=#ea9999][b]- Do not post this mod the somewhere else without permission.
- Do not reupload this mod and claim them as your own.
- Do not use his face data or head mesh (including preset file) for your mods.
- Do not use this mod as resources warehouse.[/b][/color]

[Recommended]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/]Face Light[/url] by tktk

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[Credit]
Bethesda
